attributes.action: Animals have feelings, stop them being hurt by Theresa May’s idiocy.
attributes.additional_details:
It’s very coincidental that they make this decision during the World Cup and brexit, meaning it won’t make it to the front PE of any newspapers when it deserves to be there.

Save an animal, it takes 2 seconds to sign. 

Peace and Thankyou for reading,

Zac
attributes.background:
Animals have feelings, feel pain and hold emotions, some scientifically proven stronger than our own. 

Theresa May believes with her party of twits that animals have no feelings and cannot feel pain. Basically, they want to killl foxes and anything for financial gain, just no pets (apparently).

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
